pointsandrectangleslab

Class APRectangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • pointsandrectangleslab.APRectangle

  • public class APRectangle
extends java.lang.Object
    Represent a rectangle to be drawn in a Graphics window. The rectangle has APPoint top left corner, double width, double height, and double angle.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      APRectangle(APPoint topLeft, double width, double height)
      Constructor that creates a new APRectangle object by taking the top left point, the width, and the height.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void draw(java.awt.Graphics g)
      Draw four lines of the rectangle.
      double getAngle()
      Returns the angle of the rectangle.
      APPoint getBottomLeft()
      Return the bottom left coordinates of the rectangle.
      APPoint getBottomRight()
      Return the bottom right coordinates of the rectangle.
      double getHeight()
      Returns the vertical height of the rectangle.
      APPoint getTopLeft()
      Returns the top left point of the rectangle.
      APPoint getTopRight()
      Return the top right coordinates of the rectangle.
      double getWidth()
      Returns the horizontal width of the rectangle.
      static java.lang.String printAPRectangle(APRectangle r)
      Return the rectangle's information like its top left point, width, and height in a specific format.
      void setAngle(double angle)
      Update myAngle to the given angle from the object
      void setHeight(double height)
      Update myHeight to the given height from the object.
      void setTopLeft(APPoint topLeft)
      Update myTopLeft to the given topLeft coordinates from the object.
      void setWidth(double width)
      Update myWdith to the given width from the object.
      void shrink(double d)
      Shrink the rectangle to d percent of the original rectangle.

    • Constructor Detail

      • APRectangle

        public APRectangle(APPoint topLeft,
                   double width,
                   double height)
        Constructor that creates a new APRectangle object by taking the top left point, the width, and the height. Preconditions: parameter topleft, width, and height must have values and must not be null. Postconditions: the rectangle's top left point, width, and height are stored to instance variables.
        Parameters:
        topLeft - (APPoint) the top left of the rectangle.
        width - (double) the horizontal width of the rectangle.
        height - (double) the vertical height of the rectangle.
